name: Indenture
description:
Story:

The Nishimura family resides in the quiet countryside far away from the city in Japan. A proud family with a history of Kendo and owns a Kendo Dojo, their name was famous and influential. That is of course until one day, tragic struck at their family. A haunting secret deal that was made by the family years ago has come to haunt them. How would the Nishimura family deal with this? Would it be the end of them or is there a way to save their reputation and their beloved Dojo?


  • Over 20 CGs + More.
  • Multiple Endings
  • Visually stunning backgrounds
  • 6 hours+ of gameplay
  • Eargasm background music for you to enjoy.
